alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 2:28PM CST until January 12 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 228 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dozier, or 13 miles north of Andalusia, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Lee, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Roeton, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Clowers Crossroads, Arcus, Woodland Grove Church, Jack, Java and Chestnut Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
